tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE virtual_lab_environment (
  lab_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  lab_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  lab_description TEXT,
  lab_status BOOLEAN DEFAULT FALSE
)

CREATE TABLE virtual_lab_experiments (
    experiment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    experiment_name VARCHAR(50),
    experiment_description TEXT,
    student_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES virtual_lab_students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_task (
  task_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  task_description TEXT,
  lab_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (lab_id) REFERENCES lab_environment(lab_id)
);

CREATE TABLE lab_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  task_id INT,
  student_id INT,
  progress_status VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  FOREIGN KEY (task_id) REFERENCES lab_task(task_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (student_id) REFERENCES students(student_id)
);

CREATE TABLE enrollments (
    enrollment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    student_id INT NOT NULL,
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    enrollment_date DATE,
    enrollment_grade VARCHAR(2)
);

CREATE TABLE assignments (
    assignment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    course_id INT NOT NULL,
    assignment_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    assignment_due_date DATE,
    assignment_points INT
);

CREATE TABLE submissions (
    submission_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    assignment_id INT NOT NULL,
    user_id INT NOT NULL,
    submission_date DATE,
    grade INT
);
